import React, {useState} from 'react' import styles from './modal-tweet.module.css' import Photo from '../photo' import IconButton from '../icon-button' import {Close} from '../icons' import ThemeButton from '../theme-button' var layout= [] function ModalTweet({onClick= () => {}}) { const [idea,setIdea]=useState('') var myData localStorage.setItem('TEXT',JSON.stringify(myData)) const onSubmit= (e) => { e.preventDefault() layout.push(idea) localStorage.setItem('TEXT',JSON.stringify(layout)) myData=localStorage.getItem('TEXT') onClick(false) console.log(myData); } return (
